com.riskgame.controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.controller.PlayerController

  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Player Controller is for the beginning of the game play. Its contains methods which will take the details from the players, and starts the eventual phase.
    Author:
    Shresthi Garg, Nikitha, Anusha

        public void gamePlay(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
              throws java.lang.Exception

      • allocationOfCountry

        public void allocationOfCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
        Method to assign countries to the players. Random allocation of countries to the players will happen in this method.
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - Object of mapGraph which consists of map details

      • allocationOfArmyToPlayers

        public void allocationOfArmyToPlayers(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
        Method to assign the number of armies to the players which differs based on the players count. Army allocation is done as per the conquest game rule.
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - - The GameMapGraph object

      • allocationOfArmyToCountriesInitially

        public void allocationOfArmyToCountriesInitially(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
        Method to assign armies to the countries so that each country will get at least one army as per the conquest game rule.
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - Object of mapGraph which consists of map details

      • reinforcementPhase

        public int reinforcementPhase(Player player,
                              GameMapGraph mapGraph)
        This method assigns the number of armies to the player when certain conditions are met.
        Parameters:
        player- - players whose armies are to be assigned
        mapGraph - - GameMapGraph object
        Returns:
        the reinforced armies

      • attackPhase

      • moveArmies

        public void moveArmies(Country fromCountry,
                       Country toCountry,
                       int armiesCount)
        This method takes the values for each player from the startFortification method and does the manipulation of armies and assign the armies
        Parameters:
        fromCountry - - The country from where player want to move army
        toCountry - - The country to where player want to move army
        armiesCount - - Count of armies player wish to move

      • armiesAssignedToCountries

        public void armiesAssignedToCountries(GameMapGraph mapGraph,
                                      java.lang.String country,
                                      int armiesCount)
        This method is used to assign armies to the Countries. It checks the available army and assigns the army to the requested country
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - - GameMapGraph object
        country - - the country given to players
        armiesCount - - the count of the armies player has
